name: Quantum Catalyst
description:
This is a topdown shooter where time slows down, as you take more damage. Can you make it to the end before your time comes?

This game was created in 29 hrs for the SAE Sydney Game Jam  - 1HP  game jam, and was a runner up for the best game. This game is very short, but I hope it continue work on this project in the future.

To play the game simply download the game, and play the .exe file.

NOTE: To pickup weapons press spacebar! In this build the space bar indicator stopped working.
